doc.title: Det perfekte kup
doc.plot: Huge Secret Agent/Big Heist type of gameshow, in which contestants had to get inside the fictitious headquarters of "??" corp, in order to break into the vault and escape with a large sum of money. Three Contestants would go through various rounds of physical and mental challenges working together, risking capture and setting off alarms. But in the final escape only one of them would be able to reach the exit and escape with the loot.
